enchantment.ere.frost.desc: Applies slowness upon hit. Increases with the level.
enchantment.ere.randomness.desc: Gives a random effect everytime a player is hit.
enchantment.ere.enddamage.desc: Increases damage to void based mobs.
enchantment.ere.netherdamage.desc: Increases damage to nether based mobs.
enchantment.ere.bunnyhop.desc: Gives you the ability to jump like a rabbit.
enchantment.ere.poisonblade.desc: Applies poison upon hit. Increases with the level.
enchantment.ere.hungercurse.desc: Gives the hunger effect upon being hit.
enchantment.ere.soap.desc: Imagine being so soapy you're gliding over anything.
